nodes.bodyText:
i'd suggest removing remarksReportingEnabled parameter from createOracleQueryRunner and using connectorProperties for that.
can be a follow up (=> issue?)

Do you mean?
boolean connectionPoolEnabled,  boolean remarksReportingEnabled) => Map<String, Object> extraConnectorProperties
